Service Details: Offers dental services that include Orthodontics using Fastbraces, dental care for children, intra-oral camera, cosmetic dentistry, crowns and bridges, dentures, root canal therapy, implants, sedation dentistry, hospital dentistry (at Summerland Health Centre), sleep apnea therapy, sports guards and night guards
